panels.description: This displays the CPU requests vs actual CPUusage. For example if you see 5 cores here, that means this project is request 5 cores more than it requires.
panels.title: CPU request/usage disparity

panels.description: This displays the memory requests vs actual usage. For example if you see 5GiB here, that means this project is request 5GiB more than it requires.
panels.title: Memory request/usage disparity
Total time duration the container has been throttled

panels.description: Table to help you decide the correct requests and limits to set on a deployment
panels.title: Right Sizing Table
